Row.Text: Onbashira Festival
The residents of {1_City} are celebrating the Onbashira festival![NEWLINE]
Their reverence for our faith shall benefit us all.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and {2_Faith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith.[ENDCOLOR]
The celebration of the Onbashira festival has reaffirmed the faith of the people in us.
A Mysterious Form Has Been Sighted!

A mysterious giant has been seen wandering around. It can suddenly appear and can just as suddenly vanish seemingly without a trace. Everyone who has seen it has become curious about it, and wonders about the truth behind this strange sight.[NEWLINE]
It's a giant robot!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a unique Giant Death Robot.[ENDCOLOR]
We have revealed that the giant is actually a robotic superweapon named Hisoutensoku.
It's an advertising balloon.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Trade Routes to the capital generate additional [ICON_GOLD] Gold and [ICON_PEACE] Faith.[ENDCOLOR]
The kappa have loaned us the steam-powered advertising balloon named Hisoutensoku.
It's not important.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
The mysterious figure has vanished, but may someday reappear.
A Landslide Occurs!

The kappa residing near {1_City} have inadvertantly caused a landslide while attempting to construct a dam, blocking the river and causing it to flood. We can assist them in clearing away the debris, but constructing a proper hydroelectric dam here may be a good idea as well.[NEWLINE]
We shall assist them with clearing away the debris from the landslide.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Faith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith.[ENDCOLOR]
We have cleared away the debris blocking the river, restoring its normal flow.
We shall supervise the construction of a proper hydroelectric dam.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Faith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith and {2_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a Kappa Dam in {3_City}.[ENDCOLOR]
Under our supervision, the kappa have constructed a proper hydroelectric dam, providing a boost to production in {1_City}.
It's none of our concern.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]All riverside improvements near {1_City} are pillaged.[ENDCOLOR]
The debris from the landslide has eventually been washed away, but left devastation in its wake.
